website_summaries.verdict: It's insanely fun to swing around Manhattan and fight as Spider-Man, but the game's depth may come up short for players who are looking for more than just fan service.
pros: Spider-Man features an astonishing recreation of New York City, including most of its districts and landmarks
Swinging and fighting is super satisfying and doesn't get old
It's a love letter to Spider-Man fans
cons: The gameplay suffers from a limited amount of variation
A lot of the missions play the same and rarely does it go beyond a few types of mechanics
Some of the writing falls short and the overall story isn't compelling

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 33 and this game is too much fun! No downgrading whatsoever! Paddles look beautiful lol you can find long reviews, I’ll just keep it simple: this game delivers! If you want to play as Spider-Man, then you’re gonna have a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: PS4 Exclusive - Single Player - Worth the price of admission
customer_reviews.text: Spider-man is a must have PlayStation exclusive title. It's not a timed exclusive ... it's a 100% PlayStation 4 exclusive game. This is a beat-em-up style game... with Spider-Man's gravity defying moves. The game controls / gameplay are crafted well. They are intuitive and it leads to a very pleasing gaming experience. I don't have a 4K tv or PlayStation Pro... but the standard visuals are well done. The audio and voice acting match the action sequences and are well done throughout the entire game. This is a PlayStation must have title. It's the best Spider-Man game to date.
customer_reviews.author: Bluevoodu

customer_reviews.title: It's ok...
customer_reviews.text: First off the graphics of this game are amazing. My problem with it is that the story line or lack thereof is clunky. It is not like the Batman Arkham where the story line was very fluid and the next mission was clear. Here you can explore all of New York which is cool but I would have liked it to not focus so much on side missions or having to go talk to Doctor Octavius or see Aunt May so often and focus on villains. Not saying I hate it but I don't love it.
customer_reviews.author: MRQ

customer_reviews.title: Best Superhero game to date!
customer_reviews.text: Been playing for 9+ hours now and so far I'm loving the experience... It even beats what Rocksteady did with Batman Arkham Knight or Arkham City... The freedom of seamlessly swinging around NY with a very rich/vivid color pallet makes best Spiderman game to date! Great Job Insomniac Games!!
customer_reviews.author: che

customer_reviews.title: Be careful - not the product that is promised
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be the US edition but what was received was the European edition. The game works but it is not possible to add downloadable content since add-ons refuse to work with anything other than the US edition. So now I have to repurchase the game from somewhere where I can see it before I buy it.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: SENT THE WRONG REGION’S DISC
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the game was AMAZING. However I was sent the EU version of the game and I live in the US. So like everyone else I expected to get the US version of the game. However the game came with a sticker saying it played in English and I went along with it. Game played fine, until this week I purchased the DLC. Now I cannot use the DLC because it is region locked and the disc of the game I have is from EU while the DLC is US and they are not compatible. And as DLC is a digital purchase I can’t just get my money back for that either. So beware purchasing discs from here!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YOU are the Super Hero
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun, you actually feel like spiderman. Scaling buildings and running up them is phenomenal. Your actions and fighting skills are very easy to use, its limitless on the attack options, but most importantly, it's the real deal spiderman. A little Batman Arkham mixed with assassins creed. It's so much fun and worth the money. Believe me, this game is so good it will stay $60 for a long time. If you can afford it. Buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus R.

customer_reviews.title: This game by itself is worth buying a PS4 Pro for
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the best games out for any platform, just amazing. Everything good about the Arkham series but done in a more fluid and engaging way. The open world Manhattan environment is gorgeous and immersive, the combat is frenetic, three dimensional and insanely fun, and the story is incredibly entertaining. Get this game!
customer_reviews.author: J. McG

customer_reviews.title: It's the pinnacle of Spiderman games
customer_reviews.text: This game is great, the graphics are amazing, hell just swinging around in the city is fun lol. The combat is quick and intuitive, lots of suits, powers and gadgets. Living it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THEY WILL SEND YOU A WRONG COPY
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my little brother for his birthday, when it arrived I found out it's actually the European version. Normally this wouldn't be that big of a deal because the PS4 does not region lock games, but YOU CANNOT buy DLC for the game in the PSN store. You know what that means? You are losing the potential to play countless hours of extra content and enjoyment. Also the subtitles for the game are not in English, so if you are some one who needs assistance with hearing guess what you're out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: European version
customer_reviews.text: Order this expecting it would be US version because that’s how it’s advertised and it was the European version
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EU Version
customer_reviews.text: Some how we received an EU version of the game. After completing it we wanted to add the DLC but could because you can’t mix USA and EU dlc. The game was fun just upset that when items is being shipped within the United States we received an EU copy of the game.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Berd

customer_reviews.title: Needed a game from the U.S.
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I got this game from Europe which means that I can't play any DLCs because of it. I can play the full game easy but the game has to be in this region in order for me to purchase the DLCs which I just found out by Sony. The game itself is amazing but sadly I can't continue it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: The Hero we want; the Hero we need.
customer_reviews.text: I’m shocked how amazing this game is. Insomniac was the perfect developer to take on this task and everything they do right shines here. Loving every moment.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Batman Arkham Knight Meets Watch Dogs
customer_reviews.text: A few hours in and I'm really enjoying the game play! I wouldn't call it the best game ever but will update if that changes. It's fun, the graphics are phenomenal, and the music is exciting. There's a lot to do! I personally find the combat difficult but mainly because it's a lot of combos and I'm not great with those. I will say this game is pretty much just Batman Arkham Knight meets Watch Dogs, with webs and laughs. I do like both of those games so I'm not complaining! Was initially shipped a broken box but the replacement process was quick and painless. Both discs were the US version for the record!
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: I had one of the biggest, stupidest grins ever on my face while playing this O.o
customer_reviews.text: By the games progression I'm 23% complete. So like I said above after starting the game up and started to press R2 for my first web-swing; I was smiling like the village idiot on laughing gas! Awesome game-play and amazing sense of speed as you fly through the air. Combat can be hilarious at times and as hard or easy as you want with adjustable difficulty. Fighting is a lot of fun when you use the webs a lot in your moves. Most pure fun I had in a game in a while.
customer_reviews.author: TooCasualDX

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: The game is beautiful and the story is great. However, Amazon sent me a European version, living in the US I cannot install and play the DLCs. Read the other one star review, big fubar on their part. The game they advertise is the US version but if you receive the version shown in the photo (notice the different rating) it will not work with anything from the PlayStation US site so buyer beware. You will have to purchase a US version and reinstall the whole game if you want to play the DLCs. If you don’t care for DLCs then enjoy whatever version they send. Quality control is overrated anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kal-el

customer_reviews.title: Basically Grand Theft Auto as Spider-Man
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best game I have played in a long time. Worth every penny. Took about 25-30 hours to get 100% and unlock all trophies. It’s basically Grand Theft Auto where you play as Spider-Man and can’t kill anyone or steal cars (so I guess not that much like it). But the open world and ability to go anywhere is very similar. And it’s a beautiful game. My 9 year old loves it as well and it’s the perfect difficulty for him even on normal. I love the amount of checkpoints during the missions so he doesn’t have to start over from the beginning every time. Swinging around the city is just an amazing feeling. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: The Spider-Man game we’ve always wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this game. Since release day I spent all my spare time playing it. Has to be my favorite version of Spider-Man, and one of my favorite games ever. Swinging around NYC is such a blast, I could do it for hours. Also the graphics are gorgeous, the story is phenomenal, and the voice acting is perfect. Not to mention all the Easter eggs you can find. Can’t wait for the DLC coming soon. A must buy for any Spidey fan.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful who you buy from
customer_reviews.text: They sold me a copy that was only supposed to be sold overseas and now I can't play any of the DLCs cause it's meant for only this region
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: A swing and miss
customer_reviews.text: This game was so-so. I’m not a huge Spider-Man fan, but can usually play any game given the right level of fun. Pros: Spider-Man portrays the sling and swing motions better than any Spider-Man game I’ve ever played. You actually feel like you’re flying through NYC. Cons: the city doesn’t feel alive to me. When compared to great titles such as GTA V, urban areas felt scripted, and at times, repetitive. Furthmore, missions (especially side missions) felt like busywork. IMO this is “rental” material and is only fun for the first 3-5 hours after which the game suffers from repetition and lacks engagement.
customer_reviews.author: tboe

customer_reviews.title: Ehrmagherd
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best game I’ve ever played. Loved the Arkham series. Far Cry is an amazing series. Loved Witcher and Horizon too... but this one... this one game here... Probably spent too many nights not sleeping to count, but I have zero regrets staying up 24 hours straight several times playing this game. Swinging around NYC and having so much fun. The DLC is great too, albeit a little short for each story, but all 3 together is a nice epilogue for the game. Can’t wait for the second one, I hope the mechanics are the same and they just do a new and fantastic story. Insomniac Games hit a Grand Slam with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: The Amazing Spider-Man ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: This highly anticipated game is and always will be a beautiful and glorious journey. This game may not be loved by many, it not a game for everyone and you can’t always please a billion people. But I just had no choice but to leave a review this game deserves. It is definitely a 10/10, it is definitely an amazing storyline with tons to do and progressively fun and awesome combat. Ignore the little kids complaint about small things and enjoy this for what it truly is. Spider-Man created by passionate fans, for us passionate fans. SHOUT OUT TO INSOMNIAC AND MARVEL❤️
customer_reviews.author: Koosha Mokhbery

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal even for kids
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing, from soundtrack to gameplay to fight scene and actions everything. I especially love the fact that i can plan this game with family around. No bad language in the game or scenes what so ever. Spider man is a prime example of how you can make a great game which is suitable for all ages. It did remind of batman a little but I liked this game way better.
customer_reviews.author: Foz

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Superhero games of all time
customer_reviews.text: Aside of perhaps the Batman: Arkham games, you won't find a better superhero video game experience than this. Visuals and audio are both spectacular, the game looks so good it's like you're playing a CGI animated movie. Combat is super fun, and the whole game handles like a dream. Web-swinging across the city is visually gorgeous and incredibly satisfying and Spider-Man's one-liners perfectly capture his comic persona. If you like action-adventure games or superhero games at all, this is a must-have.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Really fun
customer_reviews.text: I won't write a super detailed review - but overall this game was beautiful, fun, and just overall an enjoyable experience. I'd say the visuals are probably one of the greatest things about the game. Playing the game as Spider-Man and going around New York City, well, Manhattan to be precise, is just a lot of fun however graphics are so impressive and beautiful, it's easy to get lost and just look around and explore Manhattan swinging along buildings and climbing to the top of really tall ones. The story is okay, the characters are likeable. I'm honestly excited to see a sequel because there's such a huge story they can still tell.
customer_reviews.author: Yangviii

customer_reviews.title: Open world and engaging
customer_reviews.text: I burned through this game rather quickly, but it has plenty to offer in regards to collectibles and challenges. The storyline picks up quite a bit in the last 1/3, but I was engaged by the characters throughout. The controls can get complicated, but after a few hours of familiarization you'll be slinging webs like a pro. There are a number of combat strategies, but if you're playing on a normal difficulty setting you can ignore most of it and just keep punching and kicking. One of the more memorable open world games inthe past years.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel Bass

customer_reviews.title: Meh.  Mostly a map icon chasing game, uninspiring combat and story.
customer_reviews.text: I got this because of all the rave reviews and it was on sale. It's very mediocre, it's basically a "Far Cry" format where you are chasing icons all over the map. The story isn't anything to write home about, although the cut scenes were done well and enjoyable. The combat is very uninspiring, even with experimentation into the perks system you inevitably end up just spamming the same moves over and over again. Swinging through the city was really good though. Game is worth it if you find it half price, otherwise I'd pass.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great but repetitive
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the greatest representation of Spider-Man outside of comics. You really get a feel for the character and his supporting cast as well as some epic and emotional moments. Graphics, voice acting, and gameplay are top notch but you'll find yourself face to face with a lot of "busy work" to pad out the game. Random crimes and fights with random faceless gang members will test your patience. Still a must buy/play
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Experience from start to finish
customer_reviews.text: Loved this game! Everything about it is fun and fluid. Controls and combat are easy to get into and surprisingly deep. THe story is pretty entertaining and kept me engaged. I did basically everything in the main story and all side missions. I decided against getting any DLC as it felt to be more of the same. Good times to be had with this game for sure. Towards the end, it can feel repetitive, but this was really after doing my thousandth crime side mission. I would say this game is worth buying and completing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Fun game play but I hate the last boss fight
customer_reviews.text: The game play and game dynamics is great. I loved swinging through New York City. The story line is interesting. The reason it's not 5 stars is because I cannot get past the final boss fight and it is a required fight to finish the game/story. I loved the game up until then but after trying to play for a week, night after night and still not being able to get past it I finally just quit.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Holman

customer_reviews.title: It’s no Batman
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy this game due to all the comparisons to the Arkham series. However I have to say that I am disappointed. The game has amazing graphics and the combat system is fun. On the other hand the story line is disjointed and doesn’t really develop the villains like Arkham does. Without the character development the game becomes repetitive, doing the same side missions over and over. I have enjoyed the game but it isn’t the most amazing game ever.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyDart

customer_reviews.title: Not a Masterpiece... :(
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to adore this game, but found too many things wrong with it. First, the storyline is incredibly irritating and nonsensical. People blame Spiderman for things that make zero sense, Spiderman can't complete missions that should be very easy to finish, but the scriptwriter decided to make that 'part of the story,' and the combat is VERY VERY repetitive. Prepare to beat the everloving heck out of your square button. There are plenty of things to love about this game. Graphics are freaking beautiful, web-slinging is absolutely perfect, but I actually had to put this one down and play something else. It was way too irritating to play this game. I'd but it for about $15-20.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Jade

customer_reviews.title: Webslinging at its best!
customer_reviews.text: I'll just come out and say it.... jumping off the Avengers tower, free falling hundreds of feet only to shoot out a web last second and swing foot first into a mugger's face made me shout out with joy. I have been having so much fun with this game in the few days I have been playing. The graphics are fantastic, combat is challenging yet rewarding, the story is great, side missions are engaging, and the movement mechanics are a blast. This is a must play for any Spider-fan.
customer_reviews.author: William Masten

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: I was initially really excited to receive this game. It is advertised as being an English copy of the game, but when I received it, it was the European copy. I looked at the reviews afterwards and many people said they couldn't download the DLC's on their English PS4. So I returned it. BUYER BEWARE. THEY ADVERTISE IT IN ENGLISH BUT YOU WILL RECEIVE A EUROPEAN COPY.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: One word: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Definitely in the running for the top 3 maybe top 2 P4 games of the year. This game makes you feel like you are Spider-Man. There is SO much to do in the game and for my PS story gamers..this game reminds me of Ratchet & Clank, Jak & Daxter, sly cooper, type of game with a straight intriguing story line and several different activities and collectibles in between. The best Spider-Man game to date and I am speaking from the early beginnings of Spider-Man being on N64 lol. Insomniac has done Spider Man well.
customer_reviews.author: k92king

customer_reviews.title: No superman, what a waste.
customer_reviews.text: Thought you could play as Superman, but when I Put the disc in I found out you can only play as Spiderman. Why only put spiderman in it? That makes no sense. So freaking stupid, don't buy it if you want to play as the epic but lovable nerd Clark Kent.
customer_reviews.author: BIG BUNGO'S TINY REVIEWS !

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I'd like this game, I was afraid it would be choppy and boring. Spider Man is also just not my favorite character. However, the game play is fairly intuitive and the game overall is entertaining. The graphics are clean and bright. I also enjoy the side games. The storyline isn't bad. Personally it didn't grab me a whole lot, but if you're a Spider Man fan I'd imagine that you'd love this game.
customer_reviews.author: amvs

customer_reviews.title: One of the best games in recent years
customer_reviews.text: This game is fantastic! It’s so fun and I spent many hours with it and never got bored. We need more single-player, story-driven games without micro transactions like this one. The open world concept was just what I wanted in a Spider-Man game. The only DLC are expansions for additional gameplay, not micro-transactions or “pay to win” features. Love this game!
customer_reviews.author: 21_Guns

customer_reviews.title: One of the best in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing! I have been a gamer for as long as I can remember, but it seems like lately very few games can hold my attention for long. Spider-Man reinvigorated my love for gaming. I played it to completion and I am considering playing it again on a higher difficulty. I even went through and did most of the side missions. The control style was fluid, the graphics were beautiful, and the pacing engaged me in the story without boring me with too many cut scenes. Even just swinging around the city was a blast. This game is worth every penny and I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Missy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Spider-Man is pretty much everything I wanted in a superhero game. Great graphics, bombastic action, and a sense of freedom us mortals can't achieve. This all being said, it's not perfect. The puzzle mini-games are horribly boring and stupid, completing all the content doesn't take too long, and the MJ and Miles missions bog down the games pacing. But man, when you're soaring above those NYC rooftops only to swan dive thousands of feet, shooting a web line out at the last moment before hitting the pavement and just narrowly move between the oncoming traffic? It's bliss.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Worth it just for the suites
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me a lot of Infamous. Really fun to play and gives you a real feel of traversing an immense city as a superhero. But the most unexpected part for me was how many suits there are to unlock and how fun that would be. It's really great to see how much detail they put into the different Spidey costumes and takes me back to a time where I was flipping through old Marvel anthologies just to see all the cool outfits. Really perfect Spider-Man game.
customer_reviews.author: HowardTaftMD

customer_reviews.title: Quicksand!
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Christmas and I've never seen him sucked into a game like this one. He loved the game and stayed up late during his Christmas break just to beat the game. He's a long time gamer and more into FPS games, but this single player campaign sucked him in until he couldn't put it down. Well made game, lots of fun, and great story line.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gullett

customer_reviews.title: amazing game!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so fun, and the three DLC's just enhance the game but dont completely finish the storyline,leaving it open ended. The game play is very smooth. Interaction with NPC's is great. MJ is kinda written a bit... meanish and coldish which I wasnt a fan of (huge MJ fan!) but even I could forgive it given everything. Once you beat the game you still have achievements to fullfil. This game is amazing,
customer_reviews.author: R. Kern

customer_reviews.title: Received European version of game instead of US version
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware if you live in the US. I ordered this as a gift for Christmas and was disappointed when I found out that I received a EU version of the game instead of a USA version. The EU version will not work with any DLC if you are in the USA. The item description shows a US rating of “T” and you can see in the one I received shows, “16”.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S. Karnes

customer_reviews.title: Really fun game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this once it went on sale. It turned out to be a really fun game to play. Really straightforward with various suits and skill points to be had. Main Missions follow a nice storyline along with side missions. HDR Graphics look fantastic on my 65in OLED. Well designed city views. Just wish spidey could interact with local pedestrians. Overall it's still a great game to play.
customer_reviews.author: EndoT800

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: Best Spider-Man game ever. If you like the Arkham games and Spider-Man/Marvel, you'll enjoy this a lot. Unfortunately I had to go to Gamestop to get it because Amazon was late and I couldn't wait a whole weekend to play this.
customer_reviews.author: prescribed drone

customer_reviews.title: MY dude trust me I’d play it if I were you
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. I’d recommend it to anyone who’s a Spider-Man fan. The fighting mechanics is really good and the story and just as good! Last time I ever played a Spider-Man game was back then when I was a kid on the GameCube, PlayStation 1, and a PlayStation2.
customer_reviews.author: SlumDiggity

customer_reviews.title: Compelling story, fun action
customer_reviews.text: You've read and heard about the hype, why are you reading these reviews? This game is great on so many levels, just go play it already! Still reading? I'd this game is a lot like Arkham city. Open world, compelling story, and non-stop action. You'll become attached to characters, you'll get pissed off at enemies, and when you're finally finished you'll be left content.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: As far as the product advertised on amazon, it’s exactly what you expect, the game comes as a physical copy in a plastic wrapped case 5/5. As far as the actual game goes, I’ve been playing it for a couple hours and I’m in love, the whole thing runs very smoothly and the controls and combat are very fluid, the open world aspect is amazing with lots of side objectives alongside the actual story. If you were a fan of the Batman Arkham games I think you will truly love this game, 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular!
customer_reviews.text: likely the best superhero video game of all time. This game is everything that the Spider-man 2 video game aspired to be and more. The minute I started playing and web-slinging I let out an exhilarating yell. No other game captures the feeling of swinging through the dynamic skyline of new york city better. Story is great, graphics amazing, open world, combat makes you feel powerful with plenty of web skills. Boss battles are exciting. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nadir Bhuiyan M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Best Spider-man I've ever played
customer_reviews.text: It's the best Spider man game I've ever played. There are different spider man suits that have different abilities. The missions are awesome, there are different missions to upgrade your suits and gadgets. The game is pretty well organized, And it still fun after you beat the game. The game is not very hard to be and a has Difficulty settings as well. Enjoy this game plus I sure have it was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of 2018's Best Games
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one of the best games to come out this year and one of the most fun games to come out this generation. Even though the story follows some pretty predictable comic book tropes, the voice acting if solid enough to keep you engaged... even though you can probably guess what's going to happen next. However, the real hero is the game's gameplay. Swinging around New York is an absolute joy and the combat just gets better as you level up and unlock new moves. If you have a PS4, you owe it to yourself to check this game out.
customer_reviews.author: Ransom

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE IT’S THE RIGHT REGION!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great game, I’m a huge fan of marvel games and this one was probably that best in the past few years. I ordered it about a month and a half ago and beat it, but now the new dlc comes out and I realize I was sent a European version of the game, I live in a the U.S. So my copy is useless. I just say make sure you get your correct regions game or youll be out some money.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've played a comic book themed game. I'm only into it about two hours so far. It definitely keeps you busy. With a game like Tomb Raider, there's a lot of down time(which I enjoy). For me at least, this game's action is relentless. I've always loved Spider Man, so I wanted to venture out of my comfort zone. I know this game is going to take me quite a while to finish, but I'm cool with that.
customer_reviews.author: Phileous P. Schmoo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game!!! Must have for any Spiderman Fan
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome open world style Spider-man game. Great for the casual player and gamer enthusiast. Would recommend to anyone who wants a very immersive Spider-man fighting game. Excellent for kids and adults alike. Finally a three person open world style game that give you plenty to do before completing out the game.
customer_reviews.author: Americo Garcia Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with US systems
customer_reviews.text: This game is not supported in the States. My child can not do downloads. Tried to get info and still waiting. So my husband bought him another game that our son can do the downloads. Lessons learned. I will not purchase a video game again through this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Script for a Teenager
customer_reviews.text: This film would have been good if I were a teenager, the dialogue was written for someone in High School so it wasn't as good as I had hoped. If I were a sophomore in high school I might have enjoyed it but it was a little to immature for my taste. Hopefully Peter Parker will have matured for the next Spiderman's film.
customer_reviews.author: docloc

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get a US copy instead I got an EU
customer_reviews.text: you can still play the game but I've been trying to get the dlc's to work the last 2 days just to find out it was an EU copy and that it is region locked.
customer_reviews.author: neal von ohlen

customer_reviews.title: Feel like Spider-Man but pacing is terrible at times.
customer_reviews.text: You will move around the city in fun and fantastic ways, rarely breaking the flow of movement. But, my biggest issue is the terribly boring time you play as any other character than Parker. These segments bring the pace to a grinding halt and expect you to muddle your way through mechanics that are only used in these segments. They are a chore in an otherwise great game.
customer_reviews.author: Colonelpanik

customer_reviews.title: A game that got it right with the spider-man series.
customer_reviews.text: I've gotta say, ten minutes in to the game and I'm already in love. This game throws you in to the suit and down a river of nostalgia. There's no greater thrill than swinging across buildings and taking down thugs with your web shooters. Design and character models look amazing. Add Peter Parker's quirky dialogue throughout the game and you have yourself an amazing spider-man game!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Spidey-riffic Game
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game for my husband. The game came in superior time and it was wrapped amazingly. I have watched him play it several times since we have received it. The graphics are unbelievable! Even though we have an older flatscreen tv that is not HD the graphics are still HD quality and I'm sure would be super superior on a higher quality television. The game also offers a variety of different suits of spidermans' which I also found unique and more in depth than other games. I would definitely recommend this game to other comic book fans, spiderman enthusiasts or just someone who is looking for an addictive, amazing graphic game too play.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dickenson

customer_reviews.title: Webtastic Warrior
customer_reviews.text: Only reason this game gets 4 stars is due to the length of the main story but outside of that, this is a very solid presentation of the Spider-Man experience in my opinion. I played this game until there was nothing else to accomplish within it; and even with that being the case, swinging around the world is so satisfying that you may find yourself doing just that for hours. Definitely worth the purchase, and even better if you can get it on sale to save some money for its DLC that you WILL want.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Very fun game!
customer_reviews.text: It has a batman-like feel to it but it is also quite different. The main story line is fun but there are way too many checkpoints to beat. That's probably my least favorite part of the game. There are different types of checkpoints. A few are fun, but with the amount they included, they kind of over-killed it. Other than that, I thought it was very fun.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Epic Story, Music, Epic Gameplay
customer_reviews.text: I only had one single complaint about this game, that you can't simply step (rather than jump) down from a ledge. Outside of that, it's an outstanding piece of work. A masterpiece in superhero genre games and I would describe it as a superhero version of Grand Theft Auto, but it's so much better than GTA that I can't describe it as that.
customer_reviews.author: Sephethus

customer_reviews.title: The Best Spider Man Game
customer_reviews.text: It was great to see a spiderman game come back like this. Looks so real and has great graphics and the detail is amazing. It isn't perfect because there was a bit of downgrade from when first revealed at E3. You will enjoy this game and feel like spider man. The swinging and fighting is amazing and smooth. Side missions are a bit repetitive though but the story is the best story for a spiderman game yet. You will enjoy this game
customer_reviews.author: Karim Jovian

customer_reviews.title: It was stolen
customer_reviews.text: Someone around gold road in the area stole this game when it got here so I had to order another one and I was home when It happened and I didn't hear a door knock or they couldn't ring the doorbell when it arrived so it must of been sitting out there for some time and plus its always dark outside. but today when my book came they rang the doorbell so I guess everyone wants ps4 games and anything to do with technology and maps or drugs around here I just went with the views on this game and I watch Spiderman a lot too so I'm sure its entertaining that's why I wanted it...
customer_reviews.author: Davey

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this game more and more as I play it. Friendly is about as much difficulty as I can handle. Im about 70% thru the game and with the suit upgrades Im finally kicking butt and it feels more like "friendly" should feel. A bit difficult to start but it gets easier. Nothing I couldnt handle and Im 35 years old and my reflexes arent what they used to be. This is one of my favorites so far. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Holy moly!
customer_reviews.text: This game is one of the best super hero games out there I know it’s like a rare one since there aren’t that many super hero games but this one is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Omar Allam

customer_reviews.title: This is what playing a spiderman game should feel like!
customer_reviews.text: This game is great. It's a solid combo/beat em up game with a smidgen of an RPG element to it. The gameplay never really gets boring, sometimes a tiny bit repetitive but it's all so fast paced that before you get tired of one part, you're off to the next. It's a short game, I'd say between 20 and 30 hours, but it was fun the whole way through. If you have a PS4 and haven't played this yet, you need to.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely essential PS4 game! One of ony a few games I've played to 100%
customer_reviews.text: This game is a must-have if you own a PS4. The web-swinging physics are amazing, and it's a great way to explore the lovingly recreated city. Gameplay is excellent; I didn't even mind when it started to get a little repetitive. The story is also great, and puts a nice spin on some classic Spidey stories and characters. The DLC is also great! If you finish this game and want more (you will!), spring for the DLC. It's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: If you like the Batman series, I think you'll really like this game. It's so well done all around. You feel like you're actually spiderman swinging around NYC. I live in NYC and I can say they nailed the feel of the city. The fighting mechanics take a little time to figure out. It not as fluid feeling as in the batman games, but once you get it, it's a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Spider man not for young kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this game for my 4 year old son who was dying to play it. I know the rating says teen but hey its spiderman. Turns out it wasnt a good choice for him. The game has a lot of reading and awareness of buttons on controller. He was able to complete simple missions and freestyle mode. Other than that I was helping him mostly on 90 percent of the game. Great graphics good game play.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Cano

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware:  region issues
customer_reviews.text: Fulfilled by Amazon, sent a different region, the PlayStation, like most Blu-ray players, is region free, here’s where the problem starts, I could not purchase and play DLC or game ad-ons with my system because those are not region free. If Amazon sends you a disk from another region, and you are planning on downloading content for this game, make sure that it is the region which you are in, you can usually tell by the game rating system used on the front of the box, for example United States uses ESRB
customer_reviews.author: Adam Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: LIKE BEING IN A BIG BUDGET MCU MOVIE
customer_reviews.text: I had an amazing time playing this game and was sad that it ended. Fantastic graphics. This is the closest you'll come to knowing how it feels to swing over Manhattan. It takes a little while getting used to all the different ways to fight but lots of fun. I'm really hoping Insomniac Games is able to create games for other Marvel characters. I would LOVE them to do Iron Man !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 1st party title
customer_reviews.text: A must-buy for any fan of Spider-man and a defining 1st party title for the PS4 system. Any kid who grew up watching the 90s Spider-man cartoon will appreciate the story and characters, and any fan of games like the Batman Arkham series will enjoy the dynamic open world environment and fluid combat system. There's a lot of side missions to complement the main story, which never feel dull or burdensome to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Spiderman does what Spiderman should.
customer_reviews.text: This is the super hero game all superhero games need to be modeled after. For me Spiderman is not even high on my list of Super heroes, but this game is Amazing, easy to play and easy to get addicted to. Play mechanics are precise and easy to pick up, love to unlock new abilities as I progress, lot of fun hard to put down.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Game
customer_reviews.text: I finally had the chance to play the new Spider Man game, and I was not at all disappointed. The game is fantastic, and I am thoroughly enjoying the story. Combat and movement is very fluid and easy to master. My only gripe is that the side missions/tasks can be a bit repetitive, but they are worth completing for the easy platinum trophy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This may be the best spiderman game ever.
customer_reviews.text: The kids have played this over and over again since I bought it. It is amazingly detailed, a fun story, and a good game. I feel that it is like Arkham Knight meets spiderman, with a much more open world feel. You really and truly feel as if you were spider man. I think the designers nailed it with this game, and I highly recommend this to any Marvel fan, or any gaming enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Panther

customer_reviews.title: Awful Frustration
customer_reviews.text: Game was ok but not great until trying to catch Herman (Shocker). This was so frustrating with the goofy motion controls that it joined one of two PS4 games ever that went in my trash. If you aren't great at picking up motion controls you might want to avoid the frustration and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Foreman

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this one of the best games I have EVER experienced in my life, it is by far the most amazing Spider-man game to date. Swinging through the cities was such an experience. Spidey has been my favorite my entire life. I literally bought a PS4 for this game.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Played for only about an hour but seems entertaining. I don't have a ton of time for video games but still like to get one here and there for fun. Been thinking of picking up this one for a while and finally did once it went on sale and I enjoyed the little bit I've played it. Looking forward to playing it some more.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Not anywhere near as good as Arkham Knight
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of spiderwimp. Game starts off with weak character so initial missions fail as he gets the crap beat out of him due to the lack of any real skills. The web traversing is difficult initially primarily due to lack of consistent grapple points. Gave the game away rather than waste my time. Much happier and less irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Game!  No pun intended.
customer_reviews.text: This game was amazing. I felt like it had a very deep story and I thoroughly enjoyed it. The controls were fairly easy to get used to. My wife, who does not enjoy video games, thoroughly enjoyed the "cinematic experience" of the cutscenes and gameplay. She actually spent a handful of hours sitting next to me just enjoying the gameplay. Which is highly unusual. I wish I could give the game 6 stars. For reference, I played on the "Easy" mode to just enjoy the story. The combat has a lot of opportunity to be difficult and enjoyable on higher difficult levels.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with DLC
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this game in September not knowing it was regional. Downloaded the DLC and found out that they are not compatible. Amazon should specify where the game is from.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game
customer_reviews.text: This game is awesome. Best marvel and/or Spiderman game to ever come out. Immersive, high quality gameplay and graphics. No problems with shipping, got it from prime day deals, super good deal. I'm excited to beat it and get the DLCs now! Edit: I'm 80% for completion of the game.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: If I could give six stars I would...
customer_reviews.text: This game.....I mean words cant even explain it this game is incredible beyond a doubt, one of the best 60 dollars I ever spent this is worth that and then-some....you owe it to yourself to buy this game it's that good especially if you are a big spidey fan like me....this will be a console seller, so much love and care went in to this game.... Story, gameplay omg the gameplay....why even read my comment....BUY THIS GAME NOW
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Storti

customer_reviews.title: Best Super Hero Game
customer_reviews.text: The presentation in this game is top of the industry. Hours of fun to be had playing as Spider-man, swinging through New York. The story will keep you captivated. The battle system allows for creativity, albeit it can get repetitive for some. I never got bored of it. The only down side are the missions where you don't play as Spider-man. If you're a web head or a casual gamer, this is worth your time! One of the best PS4 games and the best Super Hero game of all time.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Experience!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Spider-Man and when I heard that one of my loved video game studios was making it, I was really excited due to their great quality games in the past. I highly recommend this game as it lives up to the hype. It truly makes you feel like you are swinging through NYC at high speeds and tells a magnificent and captivating story
customer_reviews.author: LBen

customer_reviews.title: Not US copy
customer_reviews.text: This was a foreign copy, not a US release-had to return.
customer_reviews.author: MysteryFields

customer_reviews.title: All Hail Spider-man PS4
customer_reviews.text: This review will be short: As a Spider-man fan, I have always wanted to be the wall crawler, and Spider-man 2: The Game satisfied that need. For years, many gamers and Spider-man fans alike considered that to be the best Spider-man game ever, and it was. After 14 years, it is finally passing its crown as it takes second place. Insomniac's Spider-man, speaking as someone who has beat the game and played through its entirety, is the new king.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Game, completely addicting
customer_reviews.text: what a game! great gameplay, even web swinging is fun. It's basically a rehashed version of Arkham City in every way, which is great. Plus because it takes place in a real city and in (sometimes) daylight the setting is a lot less depressing. Can't wait until enough time passes so I can start a new game.
customer_reviews.author: G Myer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This game lives up to the Amazing Spider-Man's name. All of the combat and the mechanics feel so fluid. The story was compelling and makes you care about the characters. The main story hints at DLC, however that doesn't bother me at all. When you go see a movie, you go for that movie's story. When they make spin-off from that plot, most people don't complain to have to spend another $12 to see another movie. It's how I feel this game is going to treat DLC and I can't wait to play it. Insomniac Games did an amazing job at this title and I can't wait to see what they have in-store for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Embodies Everything Great About Spiderman
customer_reviews.text: God bless Sony for letting developers like Insomniac, Guerrilla, etc., from branching out and working on new IP's! Everyone benefits from it. I am 50% through the game and don't want it to end. The mechanics, characters, and story are so well crafted and executed. I honestly thought Spiderman 2 from 10+ years ago would wind up being the pinnacle of Spiderman games, but thankfully, Insomniac proved me wrong. I can't recommend this enough!!!
customer_reviews.author: BoBaggs

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good, but misses the mark at points.
customer_reviews.text: The gameplay is quite fun, making the campaign a joy to play. However, secondary missions are dull and repetitive and the story tends to miss the mark. The villain is interesting but without spoiling anything, the story doesn't feel cohesive. It could have been a masterpiece but instead is just pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's an Arkham game, but with Spidey
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoyed the Arkham games play style, combat, open world, etc, than you'll very much enjoy the mechanics of this iteration of Spiderman. While the story and villians aren't as dark as a Batman game, it's still very well told and enjoyable. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best open world games I have played. I have beaten it multiplemtime and have plateniumed the game, the only thing I haven't completed is beating it on ultimate difficuly. The web slinging feels great and the combat is awesome also. Insoniac has been very good about adding free costumes in their updates to tie in the new movie, the original trilogy suit, and others. The doc is fun and adds a good amount to do.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL E MCCARGAR

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: They basically took Arkham City and reskinned it for Spider-Man...and it works wonderfully. Clearly made with a lot of love for New York and the whole history of Spider-Man, but with a fun, modern take on the story. Web-swinging through the city is fun as hell and the combat is basically the combat from Arkham with cool web powers. I'm having a wonderful time playing this game.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This item was sold as United States version, but is actually European version. Downladable content not supported
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Biles

customer_reviews.title: Packaging language in Japanese instead of English
customer_reviews.text: I cannot understand why the Spiderman PS4 game from Sony through Amazon would include Japanese (maybe Chinese, forgive my ignorance if I'm misrepresenting this) language on the packaging rather than English, when shipping to a customer in the US? The only thing in English is "SpiderMan" and "PS4". Don't have a good feeling about this...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Marvel’s Spider-Man - PlayStation 4
product_meta.description:
Marvel’s Spider Man features your favorite web slinger in a story unlike any before it. Now a seasoned Super Hero, Peter Parker has been busy keeping crime off the streets as Spider Man. Just as he’s ready to focus on life as Peter, a new villain threatens New York City. Faced with overwhelming odds and higher stakes, Spider Man must rise up and be greater. 

Sony Interactive Entertainment, Marvel and Insomniac Games present Marvel’s Spider Man exclusively for PlayStation 4. 

Be Spider Man 
After eight years behind the mask, Peter Parker is a crime fighting master. Feel the full power of a more experienced Spider Man with improvisational combat, dynamic acrobatics, fluid urban traversal, and environmental interactions. A rookie no longer, this is the most masterful Spider Man you’ve ever played. 

Worlds Collide 
The worlds of Peter Parker and Spider Man collide in an original action packed story. In this new Spider Man universe, iconic characters from Peter and Spider Man’s lives have been reimagined, placing familiar characters in unique roles. 

Marvel’s New York is Your Playground 
The Big Apple comes to life as Insomniac’s most expansive and interactive world yet. Swing through vibrant neighborhoods and catch breathtaking views of iconic Marvel and Manhattan landmarks. Use the environment to defeat villains with epic takedowns in true blockbuster action.
feature_bullets: Marvel's spider man features the acrobatic abilities, improvisation and web slinging that the wall crawler is famous for, while also introducing elements never before seen in a spider man game

From traversing with parkour and unique environmental interactions, to new combat and blockbuster action, it's spider man unlike any you've played before;Number of Players: 1 player; Genre: Action / Adventure
Sony interactive entertainment, insomniac games, and Marvel have teamed up to create a brand new and Authentic spider man adventure
Entertainment Software Rating Board (ESRB) Content Description: Blood, drug reference, language, violence

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars5,481 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
